Name: Wild Guns Reloaded
About the game: Wild Guns Reloaded is a fast-paced arcade-style shooter, mixing the Wild West with steampunk. Play as Clint, Annie, Doris, or Bullet the dog with his sentry drone. Grab some friends and play together for some four player action! Each character can jump, dive, and roll to get out of the way of the barrage of bullets enemies let fly – or shoot them down with their own gun! • Two new characters, each with their own weapons and tactics! • Up to 4 players and Online Rankings! • Classic and NEW Stages! • NEW Boss Enemies and Special Weapons!
